item.title: Episode 256: Planta Nubo
item.description: Reviews of Oathsworn, Fantasy Realms-Deluxe Edition, Dracula vs Van Helsing and so many more. Featured review: Planta Nubo by The Game Builders. Board game discussion starts at 43:39. https://bluepegpinkpeg.com/ep256.Thank you to our sponsors: Queen Games, Grand Gamers Guild, and AEG. Timestamps: 43:39 - Dracula vs Van Helsing; 51:15 - Oathsworn; 1:02:02 - Fantasy Realms- Deluxe Edition; 1:08:30- Get On Board: Paris & Roma. Feed: https://feeds.feedburner.com/bluepegpinkpeg

item.title: 18.53: Funding the Writing Life
item.description:
Rent isn't paid in words alone. How do all of us, in various stages of our careers, keep ourselves afloat as we go about the writing life? We're getting in the weeds with this one - tips, tricks, and tools. 


We share our thoughts on diversifying your income stream outside of traditional publishing? Let’s get creative. We’re talking about school appearances, copywriting, fellowships, consulting, and teaching... Feed: https://feeds.redcircle.com/848724f4-c420-4a75-b4be-fa3db1e46546
